medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant abdominal pain and nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Nausea for the past 5 days and right lower quadrant pain over the past two days. There were episodes of emesis earlier, but he denies vomiting currently. He has experienced constipation with intermittent diarrhea for a few months, feeling feverish during this period. Appetite is reduced due to fear of abdominal pain after bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1) HIV with no detectable viral load; 2) treated HCV. Past surgical history includes exploratory laparotomy for gunshot wound with retained fragments many years ago.
medical_history.social_history: History of remote intravenous drug use on methadone.
